name: Solitaire Tales Live
description:
Play Solitaire Tales Multiplayer!

Heroes of the land assemble! The evil Deckromancer has stolen the Deck of Power! Challenge your friends and use the magic of the cards to defeat them. Immerse yourself in a surreal landscape of magic and lore. Your ranking is yet to be made. Will you be the master of your kingdom and become a force not to be reckoned with?
From the popular Solitaire Tales (Ranked Top 10 Games on Facebook in 2014), comes the Head to Head version: Solitaire Tales Live. Challenge your skills in the best multiplayer Solitaire Tournaments or go One-on-One and see if you have what it takes to beat the best!

Exciting Features:

◆ Play multiplayer solitaire live.
◆ Daily, All Time, Hall Of Fame Leader boards.
◆ Most people know the game, only few have mastered it.

Extra Features:

◆ Facebook connection so you can play against your friends!
◆ Cool rewards!
◆ Support on multiple devices and platforms!
◆ Play against players from around the World.
